com.facebook.litho.drawable

Class DefaultComparableDrawable

  • java.lang.Object
    • Drawable
      • com.facebook.litho.drawable.ComparableDrawable
        • com.facebook.litho.drawable.DefaultComparableDrawable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ComparableColorDrawable, ComparableIntIdDrawable, ComparableResDrawable

    public class DefaultComparableDrawable
extends ComparableDrawable
    Default Comparable Drawable delegates all calls to its wrapped Drawable.

    The wrapped Drawable must be fully released from any View before wrapping, otherwise internal Drawable.Callback may be dropped.

    Using this is not the recommended as semantically equal drawables will not be considered equivalent because they will have different references, which could make diffing inefficient.

Extend ComparableDrawable for custom drawables (see BorderColorDrawable) or extend DefaultComparableDrawable and implement isEquivalentTo(ComparableDrawable) if drawable cannot extend ComparableDrawable (see ComparableColorDrawable and ComparableResDrawable).

      • create

        @Deprecated
public static DefaultComparableDrawable create(Drawable drawable)
        Deprecated. For internal use only. Consider using ComparableIntIdDrawable. Extend ComparableDrawable for custom drawables (see BorderColorDrawable) or extend DefaultComparableDrawable and implement isEquivalentTo(ComparableDrawable) if drawable cannot extend ComparableDrawable (see ComparableColorDrawable and ComparableResDrawable).
        Use to create a wrapper for a drawable which does not extend comparable drawable for backwards compatibility. Use this method only when the value of the property is going to be constant (i.e. does not depend on state)
        See Also:
        ComparableIntIdDrawable, ComparableColorDrawable, ComparableResDrawable, ComparableDrawable
